title: subparagraphs (a) to (g) of paragraph 1 of the Schedule to the following order,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Business Expenditure on
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Business Expenditure on 

Research and Development Survey) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (business expenditure research development survey) order 2020

title: subparagraphs (a) to (g) of paragraph 1 of the Schedule to the following order,
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“Commission Implementing Regulation” means Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) No. 995/2012 of 26 October 20121; 

 “R&D” means research and development; 

“survey” means 
the Business Expenditure on Research and 
Development Survey 2019/2020 that is conducted by the Central 
Statistics Office in order to obtain information on R&D, including for 
the purpose of compliance with the Commission Implementing 
Regulation. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Commission Implementing Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as 
in the Commission Implementing Regulation, except where the context 
otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order - commission implementing regulation mean commission implementing regulation (eu) no 995 2012 26 october 20121 r mean research development survey mean business expenditure research development survey 2019 2020 conducted central statistic office order obtain information r including purpose compliance commission implementing regulation (2) word expression used order also used commission implementing regulation meaning order commission implementing regulation except context otherwise requires

title: subparagraphs (a) to (g) of paragraph 1 of the Schedule to the following order,
heading: 3. Article 4 applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. Article 4 applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under any section of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation 
(EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 
December 20062, as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20083, Regulation (EU) 
No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 
20124 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 20 June 20195. 

1 OJ No. L 299, 27.10.2012, p. 18. 
2 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1. 
3 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13. 
4 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1. 
5 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th January, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4. A requirement on undertakings referred to in Article 3 to provide, once 
only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule is prescribed for the purposes of section 25 
of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993). 

[3] 3 

 
 
 
 
 4 [3]

title: subparagraphs (a) to (g) of paragraph 1 of the Schedule to the following order,
heading: Article 4

title: subparagraphs (a) to (g) of paragraph 1 of the Schedule to the following order,
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking 

concerned: 

(a) 

the nature of its business activity insofar as it relates to 
R&D in 2019; 

(b) 

expenditure on in-house R&D activity in 2019; 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

(f) 

estimated expenditure on in-house R&D activity in 
2020; 

sources of funds for in-house R&D activity performed in 
2019 and the amount in euro from each source 
concerned; 

categories of in-house R&D activity performed in 2019 
and the expenditure on each category concerned; 

the number of persons involved in in-house R&D 
activity in 2019 including, in relation to each such 
person, his or her role, qualifications and gender and the 
amount of time spent by him or her on that activity; 

(g) 

R&D activity at local unit level in 2019; 

(h) 

expenditure on R&D activity performed on behalf of the 
undertaking by other persons in 2019; 

(i) 

by reference to the qualifications of the persons 
concerned, whether the undertaking is likely, in the 
period commencing on 1 January 2020 and ending on 31 
December 2025 to increase the number of persons 
involved in in-house R&D activity; 

(j) 

engagement in 2019 by the undertaking with other 
persons in joint R&D projects. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2. 

Information regarding the time taken by the undertaking concerned to 
complete the form, questionnaire or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of information referred to in paragraph 1. 

[3] 5 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 January 2020. 

LEO VARADKAR 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [3] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH
